com.facebook.litho

Class Transition.AutoBoundsTransitionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.Transition
      • com.facebook.litho.Transition.BaseTransitionUnitsBuilder
        • com.facebook.litho.Transition.AutoBoundsTransitionBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    Transition

    public static class Transition.AutoBoundsTransitionBuilder
extends Transition.BaseTransitionUnitsBuilder
    Transition builder that targets every component in the component tree whose bounds have been changed. Default animator is SpringTransition but that can be customized by providing other animator with #animator(TransitionAnimator).

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.facebook.litho.Transition

        public Transition.AutoBoundsTransitionBuilder animator(Transition.TransitionAnimator animator)
